title: Barikui1
author: Barikui1
content: My country people good evening inside this evening, hope everyone is fine, today I want talk about new year resolution.The year don almost end, as a naija blood we be, most of us dy normally say our new year resolution towards the end of the year, but I wan ask, how many of us dy fit keep to it?Brothers and sisters i know say e no easy because las las we be still human being, we get addiction wey we vow to let go , but one way or the other, we still dy do am, I no know if anyone get similar experience?

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Normally many of us no just get resolutions wey we don set but we still get goals wey we don set to achieve for this coming new year, and as e be so, no be every thing wey we talk say we go stop naim we dey fit stop immediately I fit take small time but by God's grace we dey achieve am, though for the past years I don set some kind goal and resolution wey I no fit achieve or fit stop, but with wattin I don see , if you get any new year resolution for mind to stop, just start to dey avoid those things now or start to dey do am now if na goàl wey you set, because zeal na from small small e take dey start, and you you go drive yourself towards that goal wey you set, though sometimes r fit dey very difficult to start or stop but if you continue before you go know r don dey used to you.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Barikui1 on December 10, 2023, 07:17:55 PMMy country people good evening inside this evening, hope everyone is fine, today I want talk about new year resolution.The year don almost end, as a naija blood we be, most of us dy normally say our new year resolution towards the end of the year, but I wan ask, how many of us dy fit keep to it?Brothers and sisters i know say e no easy because las las we be still human being, we get addiction wey we vow to let go , but one way or the other, we still dy do am, I no know if anyone get similar experience?Yes na true but most at times the things wey dey make people no achieved na:1) lack of capital for starting up a business.2) easy to say Dan done, when people develop the habit of always saying and not working towards it.3) planing a resolution with a false hope. When you put your hope on something you are not really sure will generate money. Maybe hoping a meare promise which might never come true. Expecially when your uncle promise you money for business, you know make a new year resolution plan when you haven't even seen the money to start up, probably if he disapoint you, your plan also fails. That's why it is advisable to have your own fund before making a resolution plan so that when people you put hope on disappoints you you won't be left out.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: One thing we suppose to don understand about this life be say e dey very fair and unfair, like you no go fit predict this life. You see this new year 2024, e don already arrange wetin e get for you, if you like draft out plans and those things wey u want achieve and e no dey in accordance  to wetin the year get for you e no go happen despite the efforts we put inside.E just good say as the year dey start we begin put in our plans and watch if e dey align wetin the year get for us, make we try blend in so as we fit make progress. Normally nothing comes so easy, we get to make plans as well, as they say "He who fail to plan has already planned to fail.

The truth be say even if no fit do everything when you done write ou as your new year resolution, as long as you fit do some of them, you no get shaking because the whole essence of the new year resolution na toake you a better version of yourself. This year I go still knack my new year resolution and I go out in effort to see say I follow am I a reasonable extent.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Quote from: Barikui1 on December 10, 2023, 07:17:55 PMThe year don almost end, as a naija blood we be, most of us dy normally say our new year resolution towards the end of the year, but I wan ask, how many of us dy fit keep to it?Brothers and sisters i know say e no easy because las las we be still human being, we get addiction wey we vow to let go , but one way or the other, we still dy do am, I no know if anyone get similar experience?For my life, I never get any new year resolution putting down say na wetin I want be dat o. Anything wey come for me dat year, na wetin I dey move with, but dat one no mean say I no go work towards achieving good things for dat year. I notice say, many expectations dey lead to plenty disappointment and I dey try avoid dat thing by all means. I no get any new year resolutions as e be now, but one thing for sure wey I dey work towards na him be say, my next year go better pass dis year.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: Barikui1 on December 10, 2023, 07:17:55 PMMy country people good evening inside this evening, hope everyone is fine, today I want talk about new year resolution.The year don almost end, as a naija blood we be, most of us dy normally say our new year resolution towards the end of the year, but I wan ask, how many of us dy fit keep to it?Brothers and sisters i know say e no easy because las las we be still human being, we get addiction wey we vow to let go , but one way or the other, we still dy do am, I no know if anyone get similar experience?My brother, new year resolution no easy to keep oh, I no how many resolution I don try keep For myself, Omo I no dey fit keep to some, but I dey try keep some of them, but true true, if you really want to keep the resolution, you need to be very determined oh, so that nothing go distract your pursuit. Talking about addiction, Omo anything concerning addiction no easy to let go oh, sometimes you need a therapist to walk you down that road of trying to stop whatever you've been addicted to.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: The new year resolutions doesn't just workout. Who wants to make change of him/herself would take it step and meet up with the desired challenges and not rehabilitating around a season hoping it comes with a change for you. Yeah nature could come with some infinite varieties of changes where a man could derive some determined factors in choice making to changes.It is being dramatical at when people are being fund of making declarations for new years resolutions but within an hour or next all the dedicated efforts and energies on their resolutions becomes a carryover course for them. Intentionally you just can't continue because you feels imprisoned whereas your wishes to the new year resolutions was to you on your unusual tracks at where you find it hard to succeed believing the new year would come with a new beginning and a new nature to equip your journey and the next year becomes another year of resolution with the same wishes.I am just so on the take that who wants to make a different would succeed and not acting like the Nollywood stuffs here and there.Good luck to those it works for.

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on December 17, 2023, 12:47:50 AM2) easy to say Dan done, when people develop the habit of always saying and not working towards it.Procrastination most time kills ones dream. It's easy to make a resolution for the new year but is another thing to put it in place. For one to achieve in this resolution, one needs a very concrete plans that even should start now since we are just left with few weeks for the year to end. A good resolution without a good starting plans will end up failing. Alot of people made some resolution this time last year but end up doing nothing as at now.

comments.author: Philpsticks
comments.body: Dis post just make me remember some things way I don plan stop 2023 but omo my bro e no easy before half of the year you go just realize say you don dy do watin you say you go stop we many way say we go buy car 2023 now see e don reach we no see buy but next year we go still talk the same, but watin I don learn be say if you really put mind to do something e go later work out especially wen you use prayer and hard work hold am my bro e go surely stand I pray make things work out as planned 2024.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: Barikui1 on December 10, 2023, 07:17:55 PMMy country people good evening inside this evening, hope everyone is fine, today I want talk about new year resolution.The year don almost end, as a naija blood we be, most of us dy normally say our new year resolution towards the end of the year, but I wan ask, how many of us dy fit keep to it?Brothers and sisters i know say e no easy because las las we be still human being, we get addiction wey we vow to let go , but one way or the other, we still dy do am, I no know if anyone get similar experience?Resolution no be something you can just say with mouth like that and think it will happen,  new year Resolution you need to work towards it and pray, because some of the habits we exhibit can be control with the spiritual force,  we don't behave in a way because we want to. That is why after doing this things we feel very bad. Resolution can take place by examining yourself in the new year, be conscious, of the the things you do and pray let their be an end of the habit.

comments.author: Su-asa
comments.body: reality of life no be to just dey carry dey talk, sometimes na to just keep quiet and look and listen, infact Jo even look at all because the time way you take detook nah the time way you fit see something way go pepper your body or your eye self.But watin this girl talk no be lie but she no suppose to talk am at that time because some of this police me, them no dey on a good mood, because when their blood dey hot them fit do anything because them na self follow for government and them self follow for people way dey spoil this country too, so even if she talk the truth self nah beating she go recive, just because of say the truth dey always dey bitter pass lie.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Not limited to Nigeria but globally people plan resolution for new year and as time goes by it starts fading as people make some unrealistic resolutions depending on their work and life balance. Let's say I work 12 to 14 hours a day and rest of time would be occupied for sleeping and family time I cannot have a resolution like I would go to gym or start an business or do part time job because my current schedule doesn't allow that rather my resolution should be planning on looking for a better job which gives me proper work life balance for me to indulge in other activities like gym or part time job or business because we need to consider resolution based on root cause of existing problem rather than overview.

comments.author: Tmoonz
comments.body: Smiles, it's a good thing to be alive which is the greatest gift ever. Resolutions and proposals are made in accordance with this saying that he who fails to plain, plain to fail, and don't also forget that faith without work is dead. May we have the strength amd wisdom to carry out needful, once again happy new year in advance. Hip hip hip, you can complete it.

comments.author: Su-asa
comments.body: Quote from: kentrolla on December 24, 2023, 09:54:22 AMNot limited to Nigeria but globally people plan resolution for new year and as time goes by it starts fading as people make some unrealistic resolutions depending on their work and life balance. Let's say I work 12 to 14 hours a day and rest of time would be occupied for sleeping and family time I cannot have a resolution like I would go to gym or start an business or do part time job because my current schedule doesn't allow that rather my resolution should be planning on looking for a better job which gives me proper work life balance for me to indulge in other activities like gym or part time job or business because we need to consider resolution based on root cause of existing problem rather than overview.As e dey so many people plan for good things way them go fit achieve but at the end of it all, everything just turn up side  because no be watin we want na we go get but na the kind of things way God done keep for us na we go fit achieve if we wotk in a good way ti achieve am.Many people dey suffer today because of say them done go put hand for watin them no suppose to put and many people they enjoy today because of say them done go do the right thing, as we dey so, we suppose to k ow say this life divide into 2 part.1 nah for good 2 na for badIf you decide to follow the good side you go suffer before you go fit achieve watin you want and when you go get the good things you fit get them times 2 or 3 folds. If you decide to follow the bad side you go just wake up one day and everything go sure for you, but still you go get plenty things way you go lose at the last, if you no lose am from the start, you go lose am for the end.So watin I go advise he say make anybody way know say waytin e dey do dey right and e dey favor am, make em continue to dey do am and make em still do am well.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: The thing about new year resolutions be say life no just dey go straight and that na the challenge wey make majority no dey fit follow am or dem go just follow up for few months and after na to change when dem no dey meet up. Omo if you dey keep to that and you never see anything till half of the year, people dey change. Man no be God and na dat one make we no dey still sabi say God fit do plenty things at same time at the last minutes. I hope say our new year resolutions go bring light shine on us this 2024.

comments.author: Fline Han
comments.body: Fun fact: Studies show that around 80% of New Year's resolutions fail by February. However, setting specific and realistic goals can increase the chances of success.

comments.author: Bitco55
comments.body: Honestly, new year resolutions are simple facades we create and end up not going through at all. If you want to change something about yourself don't wait till the end or beginning of a new year to change it. Most new year resolutions fail not even because we didn't plan well but life happens and gets in the way, lack of consistency and other reasons Anyways, I hope 2024 would be a year we stick and succeed in whatever resolutions we make.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: We need to understand say things hard for naija and the way we dey talk about things no be so e really be as naija no balance at all to everyone of us if no be God wey dey show us love on a steady. Now concerning the subject of discussion, I believe say the only thing wey I go encourage us to do now na to commot body for the things wey dey deprive us peace of mind and the things wey dey make us spend money carelessly because once we no get peace we no fit reason well at all and when we no dey save funds we no fit stand up for responsibility if we get small money challenges. Personally i don make up my mind to avoid some bills this new year and I go try do things wen no go bring positive results to me I believe na the things I go like start from for now.
